title: ðŸ“ˆ Evaluating the market for Cam Newton and Jameis Winston (Football 3/31)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn to catch up on the NFL offseason. The guys discuss alternative ways for players to stay involved while being forced to stay at home (10:00), before exploring the seemingly non-existent market for former Heisman Trophy winners and No. 1 overall picks, Jameis Winston and Cam Newton (19:00). Will and Brady then examine the options for Jadeveon Clowney (32:30) and the teams who had the best and worst offseasons (40:30).

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â

itunes:subtitle: Why can't Cam Newton and Jameis Winston find starting gigs in the NFL? Will Brinson and Brady Quinn break down the odd offseason QB market and more.
